name: Exam Golf Game (Mallace)
description:
Press LMB to shoot the golf ball.

Length of time LMB  is held depends on the strength of the shot.

Direction of the mouse = Direction of the Ball.

Space - For 0.5s boost.

Number Keys change level 1-6

Credits:
